attributes.action: Call a General Election so that the people of Britain can decide who will be the next Prime Minister when he leaves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is soon to step down, leaving us with a new and totally unelected Prime Minister.  Britain is supposedly a democratic country - the British people should decide who governs them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
